SEARCH
Package edu.uw.pce.advjava.services

Interface OrderManager

public interface OrderManager
Maintains queues of different types of orders and requests the execution of orders when price conditions allow their execution.
Author:
Russ Moul

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    adjustPrice(int price)
    Respond to a stock price adjustment by setting threshold on dispatch filters.
    String
    getSymbol()
    Gets the stock ticker symbol for the stock managed by this stock manager.
    void
    queueOrder(StopOrder order)
    Queue a stop order.
    void
    setStopOrderProcessor(Consumer<StopOrder> processor)
    Registers the processor to be used during stop order processing.

  • Method Details

    • getSymbol

      String getSymbol()
      Gets the stock ticker symbol for the stock managed by this stock manager.
      Returns:
      the stock ticker symbol

    • adjustPrice

      void adjustPrice(int price)
      Respond to a stock price adjustment by setting threshold on dispatch filters.
      Parameters:
      price - the new price

    • queueOrder

      void queueOrder(StopOrder order)
      Queue a stop order.
      Parameters:
      order - the order to be queued

    • setStopOrderProcessor

      void setStopOrderProcessor(Consumer<StopOrder> processor)
      Registers the processor to be used during stop order processing. This will be passed on to the order queues as the dispatch callback.
      Parameters:
      processor - the callback to be registered
